); class CheckInForm extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { hMetric: true, wMetric: true, picture: undefined, found: [], }; this.storePictureURI = this.storePictureURI.bind(this); this.anyMatches = this.anyMatches.bind(this); } componentDidMount() { this.client = stitchClient; this.db = db; loginAnonymous(); } async anyMatches() { this.moveOn = true; var matches = []; console.log('matching...'); await this.db.collection('missing') .find({first : this.props.first}, { limit: 20 }) .toArray() .then(people => { people.forEach(person => matches.push(person)); }) .catch(err => console.error(`Failed to find documents: ${err}`)); this.setState({found : matches}); } storePictureURI(uri) { this.setState({picture: uri}); } render() { const onSubmit = (values) => { const pictureURI = this.state.picture; this.info = {...values, pictureURI}; } return(
